channel.title: How do i make my server no-ip?
channel.description: can someone help me make my server a no-ip server cause i dont know how..... teach me!! :confused:

item.title: How do i make my server no-ip?
item.dc:creator: @_mike2 ^mike^
item.description:
@_mike2 wrote:

1st.
To set an ip go to www.no-ip.com. Then register and activate your account.
2nd.
Next, log onto your account, and under hosts/redirects, click add.
3rd.
Then enter your server name,ip, and the rest of that stuff and click add.
4th.
Now go to the download section click your kind of computer, and download the no-ip DUC.
5th.
install the DUC, run it, then click the box that has your servername in it. And then you have your no-ip.

hope this helps

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make my server no-ip?
